argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hlatmstc.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | hlatmstc.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | hlatmstc.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 4 |  | hlatmstc.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_hlomcmat | |- ( K e. HL -> ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. AtLat ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_atlatmstc | |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. AtLat ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` { y e. A | y .<_ X } ) = X ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` { y e. A | y .<_ X } ) = X ) |
